item.description:
Christine from the CT Paranormal Society has invited
Members of the Greater New Haven Unknown
Zone to attend her presentation;

Journey Into The Paranormal

Come spend the night with a team of Professional
Investigators.

The lecture will cover everything that is paranormal.
From orbs & their many theories to exorcisms.
Also included will be examples of actual
private case with the traditional beginning of exorcism rites.
All areas of the paranormal will be covered in this lecture &
power point presentation. Bring all your paranormal questions!
Come & enjoy one of your favorite topics.
Feel free to discuss your experiences.
Get answers to your paranormal questions.

Coffee & tea will be served along with cookies.

There is no fee for this lecture.

The only thing we ask of you is to come enjoy &
Bring your questions with a good dose of
curiosity.

RSVP is now closed for everyone.
Members who are in CT Paranormal, if you RSVP Yes in CT Paranormal,
Then I require you to also RSVP Yes here.
If you RSVP No in CT Paranormal, then I require you to RSVP No here.
We are aware of the count.

The location of the Meet Up will be sent to some
Members via individual e-mail only.

I hope that who attend enjoy themselve.

Bring your positive energy and your paranormal questions.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Journey Into The Paranormal
